about_the_game:
This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 all-new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Alicianrone and Teotoratta from the Alicianrone universe, as well as announcer voices for them, plus an extra story mission!

Alicianrone & Teotoratta Character Pack includes

  • Alicianrone the Speed Witch from the world of 'Alicianrone' (Voice: Tange Sakura)
  • Teotoratta the Beast Witch from the world of 'Alicianrone' (Voice: Koyama Momoyo)
  • An extra story mission that continues the Witch storyline
  • New, unique Hyper Cards for both characters to bring chaos to the battlefield with!
  • New music tracks play as Alicianrone and Teotoratta's themes

The new characters are designed by Orange_Juice's original staff for the game's English Steam release, with character and hyper card art by Hono.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
